item.title: Every Developer is an API Designer
item.description: Every function; every class; every struct and enum and protocol is an API. YOU — are an API designer As developers, we move into and out of the role of “API Designer” constantly. Have you ever thought about that? You are an API designer! You create Application Programming Interfaces all the time. I believe that everything we create has design built in, whether we’ve thought much about it or not.
